content: you can use any yarn weight just make sure to use appropriate hook size pictures show snowflakes that are blocked and stiffened using water-based glue if you want to stiffen and block your snowflakes there is also a simple tutorial on my website this pattern uses us terminology and these abbreviations single_crochet single_crochet chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet triple crochet ml magic loop/circle/ring
